mapper.insert: insert into approval ( approval_id, task_id, project_id, requester_id, responder_id, approval_state, approval_message, approval_request_date ) values ( #{approvalId}, #{taskId}, #{projectId}, #{requesterId}, #{responderId}, #{approvalState}, #{approvalMessage}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') )
mapper.select: select a.approval_id, a.task_id, a.project_id, a.requester_id, a.responder_id, a.approval_state, a.approval_message, a.approval_request_date, a.approval_denied_message, a.approval_response_date, a.approval_response_result, t.fmt_task_id from approval a join task t on a.task_id = t.task_id where a.project_id = #{projectId}

select approval_id, task_id, project_id, requester_id, responder_id, approval_state, approval_message, approval_request_date, approval_denied_message, approval_response_date, approval_response_result from approval where project_id = #{projectId} and approval_response_result is not null

select a.approval_id, a.task_id, a.project_id, a.requester_id, a.responder_id, a.approval_state, a.approval_message, a.approval_request_date, a.approval_denied_message, a.approval_response_date, a.approval_response_result, t.fmt_task_id from approval a join task t on a.task_id = t.task_id where a.project_id = #{projectId} and a.approval_response_result is null
mapper.update: update approval set approval_response_result = #{approvalResponseResult}, approval_response_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') where approval_id = #{approvalId}
mapper.select: select approval_id, task_id, project_id, requester_id, responder_id, approval_state, approval_message, approval_request_date, approval_denied_message, approval_response_date, approval_response_result from approval where task_id = #{taskId}
